amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would reduce health insurance access and affordability for individuals based on their occupation.

action.text: Amendment SA 60 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 60 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 8.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 60.
Amendment SA 60 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator King.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 305(b)(2) of the CBA with respect to amendment SA 60 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 50. Record Vote Number: 8.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 60 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator King.
